questions.question: でんしゃ（＿）のります。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

～にのります - to ride on (transport)

でんしゃ - train

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉

「でんしゃにのります」 means "I ride the train."

  • を - used for direct objects
  • が - subject marker
  • へ - direction marker, but not correct for "乗る"
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer

The correct answer is に.

  • を - used for direct objects
  • が - subject marker
  • へ - direction marker, but not correct for "乗る"

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉

「これはわたしのほんです」 means "This is my book."

  • わたし - incomplete without の
  • わたしに - "to me"
  • わたしを - "me" as object
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer

The correct answer is わたしの.

  • わたし - incomplete without の
  • わたしに - "to me"
  • わたしを - "me" as object
